HomePage.title: Documents That Understand You!
HomePage.subtitle: Chat with your documents and unlock their hidden insights. Our secure, AI-powered search transforms complex information into natural conversations, letting you explore your private data through simple questions. Get precise answers, discover connections, and make your documents work smarter for you.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy – ALGOSET SRL
PrivacyPolicy.introduction: This privacy notice is provided pursuant to Articles 13 and 14 of EU Regulation 2016/679 (GDPR) to users accessing the SaaS platform provided by ALGOSET SRL, accessible exclusively through authentication.

controller.title: 1. Data Controller
controller.content:
The data controller is:
ALGOSET SRL
Via Lago d'Iseo 53, 36100 Vicenza (VI)
VAT IT03976390249 - REA VI-369285
Email: info@algoset.it

purposes.title: 2. Processing Purposes
purposes.content: Users' personal data is processed exclusively to allow access and use of the SaaS service, which enables consultation and search of technical company documentation. No marketing, profiling, or behavioral analysis activities are carried out.

dataTypes.title: 3. Types of Data Collected
dataTypes.content:
During the use of the platform, the following personal data is processed:
- First and last name (if provided through Identity Provider)
- Business email address
- Username or user ID
- Session cookies (necessary for login functionality)

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis
legalBasis.content: Data processing is based on the performance of a contract (art. 6, par. 1, letter b of GDPR), as it is necessary to allow authenticated access to the platform by users of client companies.

security.title: 5. Processing Methods and Security
security.content:
Data is processed using IT tools in compliance with the principles of lawfulness, fairness, and transparency.
The infrastructure is hosted on Amazon Web Services (AWS) – EU region (Frankfurt). Data is not transferred outside the European Economic Area (EEA).
All communications take place via encrypted connections (HTTPS). Authentication data is managed through Keycloak, with updated security policies.

recipients.title: 6. Data Recipients
recipients.content:
Data is not disclosed to third parties, except to service providers strictly necessary for the operation of the platform:
- Amazon Web Services (AWS) – cloud hosting
- Keycloak – identity management system
These entities act as data processors (Art. 28 GDPR), according to contractual agreements compliant with GDPR.

retention.title: 7. Retention Period
retention.content: Personal data is kept for the duration of the contractual relationship with the client company, and for a maximum of 12 months after account deactivation, unless different legal obligations apply.

rights.title: 8. Data Subject Rights
rights.content:
Under GDPR, the user has the right to:
- access their personal data
- request rectification or erasure
- restrict or object to processing
- request data portability
Requests can be sent to: info@algoset.it

cookies.title: 9. Cookies
cookies.content:
The platform exclusively uses technical session cookies, necessary to ensure the security and continuity of authentication.
There are no profiling cookies or third-party cookies.
Consequently, user consent is not required, nor is a cookie banner necessary.

changes.title: 10. Changes to this Privacy Notice
changes.content: ALGOSET SRL reserves the right to update this privacy notice. In case of significant changes, users will be informed through appropriate channels (e.g. email or platform notification).

CookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy – ALGOSET SRL
CookiePolicy.introduction: This Cookie Policy explains how ALGOSET SRL uses cookies and similar technologies on our website and applications.

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. Cookies are widely used to make websites work or work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to the site owners.

cookiesWeUse.title: 2. Cookies we use
cookiesWeUse.content:
We only use essential technical cookies (or "strictly necessary"), which enable basic functions such as authentication and session maintenance. These cookies are necessary for the proper functioning of the platform and cannot be disabled.

We do not use analytical, advertising, or profiling cookies, nor do we share data with third parties for such purposes.

legalBasis.title: 3. Legal basis
legalBasis.content:
According to EU Regulation 2016/679 (GDPR) and Directive 2002/58/EC (e-Privacy), as amended by Directive 2009/136/EC, essential technical cookies do not require prior user consent, as they are strictly necessary to provide the service.

The legal basis for the use of these cookies is Art. 6(1)(b) of the GDPR (performance of a contract or pre-contractual measures) and Art. 6(1)(f) (legitimate interest).

howToManage.title: 4. How to manage cookies
howToManage.content:
Since we exclusively use essential technical cookies, there is no option to disable them, as this would compromise the functioning of the platform.

However, you can configure your browser to block or alert you about cookies. Please note that blocking all cookies will have a negative impact on the functionality of our platform, including the inability to access protected areas.

changes.title: 5. Changes to the Cookie Policy
changes.content:
We reserve the right to modify this Cookie Policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page with the update date.

We encourage you to periodically review this page to stay informed about our cookie practices.

contactUs.title: 6. Contact us
contactUs.content: For any questions or clarifications about this Cookie Policy, you can contact us at: info@algoset.it
